snippet: BlackRock retracted a notification that it had reduced its stake in the struggling Italian bank UniCredit after a query by Italy's financial markets regulator.
abstract: BlackRock retracted a notification that it had reduced its stake in the struggling Italian bank UniCredit after a query by Italy's financial markets regulator.
lead_paragraph: LONDON -- BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, said on Wednesday that its stake in the struggling Italian bank UniCredit stood at 3.09 percent.

headline.main: BlackRock Says Its Stake in UniCredit Is Unchanged
